data.meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.
data.sentence: The word تَسْءَلُهُمْ comes from the root س ا ل and is associated with the meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.

data.meanings: paid, discharged, gave against will, taking upon oneself that which is not obligatory upon him; damage or loss that befalls a man in his property; lasting evil, perdition; shacked or burdened or captived
data.sentence: The word مَغْرَمٍ comes from the root غ ر م and is associated with the meanings: paid, discharged, gave against will, taking upon oneself that which is not obligatory upon him; damage or loss that befalls a man in his property; lasting evil, perdition; shacked or burdened or captived

data.meanings: to be heavy/weighty, slow/dull/sluggish, difficult/hard/grievous. thaqalaan (dual of thaqalan) - two big and weighty things, two armies. athqaal (pl. of thiql) - burden. thaqiil (pl. thiqaal) - heavy. mithqaal - weight, weight of a balance. tathaaqal - to be dull/sluggish. thaqala - to grow heavy, oppress, weigh down. mathqalatun - burdened, heavily laden, any cause of depriving a mother of her child. iththaqala (for tathaaqala) - to be born down heavily, incline heavily downwards.
data.sentence: The word مُثْقَلُونَ comes from the root ث ق ل and is associated with the meanings: to be heavy/weighty, slow/dull/sluggish, difficult/hard/grievous. thaqalaan (dual of thaqalan) - two big and weighty things, two armies. athqaal (pl. of thiql) - burden. thaqiil (pl. thiqaal) - heavy. mithqaal - weight, weight of a balance. tathaaqal - to be dull/sluggish. thaqala - to grow heavy, oppress, weigh down. mathqalatun - burdened, heavily laden, any cause of depriving a mother of her child. iththaqala (for tathaaqala) - to be born down heavily, incline heavily downwards.
